dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Zhanibek Abylkhan, scoring a perfect 140 on the UNT—that's just incredible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zhanibek Abylkhan, scoring a perfect one hundred forty on the U N T-that's just incredible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A rural student who scored 140 points on the Unified National Test (UNT) has been awarded an apartment, citing Aikyn.kz. The highest score on the 2025 UNT was achieved by Zhanibek Abylkhan, a graduate from the Turkestan region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and from what I understand, he's from a rural area in the Turkestan region, right? That makes it even more impressive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and from what I understand, he's from a rural area in the Turkestan region, right? That makes it even more impressive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Zhanibek Abylkhan is a graduate of the Shoqan Walikhanov gymnasium school, located in one of the villages of Ordabasy District in the Turkestan region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And the educational center he attended actually promised an apartment to any student who hit that 140 mark.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And the educational center he attended actually promised an apartment to any student who hit that one hundred forty mark.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the educational center where Zhanibek Abylkhan studied announced that a student who scored 140 on the UNT would be gifted an apartment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, so they followed through? Like, they actually gave him the apartment?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, so they followed through? Like, they actually gave him the apartment?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They did! They presented him a certificate today for an apartment in the city where he'll be studying. It's gonna be for his whole family.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They did! They presented him a certificate today for an apartment in the city where he'll be studying. It's gonna be for his whole family.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, it was revealed that the center presented the student with a certificate for the apartment. According to representatives of the center, the apartment will be purchased for the student's family in the city where Zhanibek will be studying.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's life-changing, honestly. And I heard he got some other prizes too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's life-changing, honestly. And I heard he got some other prizes too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, an iPhone, a laptop, a television… plus the deputy akim of Turkestan personally gave him another laptop on behalf of the regional government.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, an iPhone, a laptop, a television... plus the deputy akim of Turkestan personally gave him another laptop on behalf of the regional government.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was also reported that for his high result on the UNT, the student received an iPhone, a laptop, a television, and other valuable prizes. The deputy akim (governor) of the Turkestan region presented the student with a laptop on behalf of the regional head.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Man, what a haul. And he chose computer science as his specialized subject—no surprise there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Man, what a haul. And he chose computer science as his specialized subject-no surprise there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As Aikyn.kz notes, Zhanibek chose computer science as his specialized subject on the UNT and became the first student in Kazakhstan this year to score the maximum 140 points.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? First in the whole country this year to get max points. His teachers got letters of appreciation too, which is a nice touch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? First in the whole country this year to get max points. His teachers got letters of appreciation too, which is a nice touch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As Aikyn.kz notes, Zhanibek chose computer science as his specialized subject on the UNT and became the first student in Kazakhstan this year to score the maximum 140 points. Letters of appreciation were given to Zhanibek Abylkhan's teachers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it's stories like this that really highlight how much support can motivate students, especially from less urban areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it's stories like this that really highlight how much support can motivate students, especially from less urban areas.

dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And coming from a large family, that apartment must mean the world to them.
